remarks: Properties that determine a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Apr-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isnvi.5 $e |- X = ran G $.
isnvi.6 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
isnvi.7 $e |- <. G , S >. e. CVecOLD $.
isnvi.8 $e |- N : X --> RR $.
isnvi.9 $e |- ( ( x e. X /\ ( N ` x ) = 0 ) -> x = Z ) $.
isnvi.10 $e |- ( ( y e. CC /\ x e. X ) -> ( N ` ( y S x ) ) = ( ( abs ` y ) x. ( N ` x ) ) ) $.
isnvi.11 $e |- ( ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) -> ( N ` ( x G y ) ) <_ ( ( N ` x ) + ( N ` y ) ) ) $.
isnvi.12 $e |- U = <. <. G , S >. , N >. $.
isnvi $p |- U e. NrmCVec $.
$d G x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d X x y $.
